items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio streams connect within 3 seconds
Call quality remains stable with minimal lag under standard broadband conditions
dependencies: WebRTC or equivalent video streaming service
non_functional: Video resolution minimum 720p under optimal network conditions

notes: Assumed that the application will support both one-to-one and group text messaging, but only one-to-one video calls initially. No prior context provided, so platform (web/mobile) and authentication details are assumed.
